item.title: Virginia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "America...just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We can't stop here, this is bat country!" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "Life is very tenacious in these lawyers." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Roberto Bolaño
item.description: "I’m seventeen years old, my name is Juan García Madero, and I’m in my first semester of law school. I wanted to study literature, not law, but my uncle insisted, and in the end I gave in. I’m an orphan, and someday I’ll be a lawyer. That’s what I told my aunt and uncle, and then I shut myself in my room and cried all night." -- Roberto Bolaño

item.title: Virginia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Are you planning to follow a career in Magical Law, Miss Granger?” asked Scrimgeour. “No, I’m not,” retorted Hermione. “I’m hoping to do some good in the world!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Roberto Bolaño
item.description: "When you know something, you know it, and when you don't, you'd better learn. And in the meantime, you should keep quiet, or at least speak only when what you say will advance the learning process." -- Roberto Bolaño

item.title: Virginia add a quote by Roberto Bolaño
item.description: "If it was true that all effort led to a vast abyss, she had two recommendations to begin with, first, not to cheat people, and, second, to treat them properly. Beyond that, there was room for discussion." -- Roberto Bolaño
